name: Bloxtacle Course
description:
Bloxtacle Course is a block breaker game where you are given nearly full control over the ball itself. While breaking blocks and reaching the portal is your main goal in all of the 100+ levels, doing so may not prove so simple. You will need to utilize blocks that fit the situation, be it changing colors or opening passageways, all while avoiding the dreaded skull blocks.


Most of the time, you will need to change your ball's color in order to break the blocks of the same color. Once those are gone, then the diamond blocks become breakable:




Other times you will simply need to navigate through pathways of hazards:




Lives are not limited in the main 100 levels, but you will suffer a score penalty and lose your current streak if you do collide with a skull block. In order to be awarded gold stars for the levels and unlock the bonus modes, you will need to minimize deaths and maximize your scoring, all while moving quickly through these increasingly challenging levels!
